nodes.text: The Ritual of Blue Vertex was a rite performed by the Gree where they granted the title of "Red Rhombus" to those that had performed a great act in service to the Gree Enclave.
Gatemaster Beltek'k gave the award of "Red Rhombus" to Galactic Republic spacers after Kephess was defeated on Asation during the Hypergate crisis.
